result.execSummary:
The defendant Gladys Gallegos-Martinez was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Neglecting a Child (Specified Harm Did Not Occur), a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 948.21(2).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.descr: House of Correction - Imposed and Stayed

miscConds.notes:
Provide DNA sample and pay DNA surcharge during probation; failure to pay shall result in a civil judgment being entered.
Defendant has until 6/15/22 by 5:00 p.m to submit her DNA.
Pay all mandatory court costs, fees and surcharges during probation; faliure to pay shall result in a civil judgment being entered
Court waived all non mandatory court costs, fees and surcharges finding the defendant indigent
If defendant  successfully completes probation and pays all court costs, fees and surcharges, the Court will grant expungement.

AODA assessment and cooperate with any programs deemed necessary by the probation agent.
Absolute sobriety.

charges.descr: Neglecting a Child (Specified Harm Did Not Occur)

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Gladys Gallegos-Martinez

records.addlTxt: See CCAP financial payment plan application for specific month due dates for this ATYPP.
Affidavit and order for payment of attorney fees and costs due from Milwaukee County signed.  Filed by:  KERRI CLEGHORN  $600.00
Plea Questionnaire/Waiver of Rights and Addendum; received and filed.

Defendant Gladys Gallegos-Martinez in court with attorney Kerri Terann Cleghorn.  Mallory R Davis appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Gladys Gallegos-Martinez appeared by video means with Attorney.  Deputy Court Clerk: SD.
Status Conference held.  Defense counsel requests plea and sentencing hearing date.  Case adjourned, Br. 10.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for June 9, 2022 at 03:00 pm.

Defendant Gladys Gallegos-Martinez in court.  Mallory R Davis appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   All parties appeared by video conference.
  Court conducted Indigency Hearing. Court held colloquy with defendant. Court found defendant is eligible for appointment of counsel by court. Defendant requested court appointed counsel and agreed to reimburse Milwaukee County for the expense. The court appointed Atty. Kerri Cleghorn, present in court/in court via telephone, to represent defendant in this matter at County expense and at the rate of $100.00 per hour. The court ordered the defendant repay the County at a rate of $75.00 per month beginning at the completion of the case, and then the 1st of each month there after.
Case is adjourned to 4-26-22 at 1:30 pm for status confernece by zoom.
  This hearing will be streamed live on DAcast:
https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/d84cd54a-763c-3a58-15a9-b84acf306616  Status conference scheduled for April 26, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Court ordered no possession or use of controlled substances without a valid prescription.
DEFENDANT WAS ORDERED BY THE COURT TO REPORT TO THE MILWAUKEE COUNTY JAIL (CJF) TO BE BOOKED AND RELEASED BY 5:00 P.M. ON (2/25/2022). IF THEY FAIL TO APPEAR A BENCH WARRANT WILL BE ISSUED FOR THEIR ARREST.

Defendant Gladys Gallegos-Martinez in court.  Jennifer L Pickett appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Defendant is advised that this case is assigned to Judge Havas, Branch 10. Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause. Defendant received a copy of the complaint and was advised of right to counsel. Defendant does not qualify for Public Defender representation. Court entered a plea of not guilty on behalf of the Defendant. Court reserves Defendant's right to file a substitution of judge pursuant to Sec. 971.20 right to challenge probable cause and to have complaint read until Defendant's next scheduled court appearance. Case is adjourned for a Pretrial Conference in Branch 10.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for March 17, 2022 at 08:30 am.

ADDRESS INFO for Gladys Gallegos-Martinez
Current: 2609 S 8th Street, Milwaukee, WI 53215   (Effective: 02-23-2022)
Prior: 1433 West National Avenue, Milwaukee, WI 53204
Summons mailed.  Defendant ordered into room 221 Safety Building on 2/23/22 @ 1p
